name: Slitherin' Twist
description:
Slitherin' Twist is a variation of the 'snake' game for the retro memories you have. Quick Reflexes will be needed to finish all 39 levels with varying difficulty. Good Luck in trying to finish them all.

Local Two-player versus mode exists so you can see who can eat the most apples within a time limit.

  • 39 Different Levels
  • Two-player Versus to see who can be longest
  • Different apples have different effects while playing
  • Work to beat your high score or longest snake
